titleStmt.title: An eye-salve for the city of London: discovering unto them the great engagement that lyes upon them in point of duty and interest, to joyne speedily with the kingdome for the restoring of His Majesty, and the re-setling of the lawfull government and peace of this nation. / By a lover of peace and truth.
titleStmt.author: Lover of peace and truth.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
